pkgmetadata.longdescription: The "eselect net" module manages /etc/init.d/net.* initscript symlinks. Use "eselect net add <interface>" to add a link from /etc/init.d/net.<interface> to /etc/init.d/net.lo; similarly, "eselect net delete <interface>" deletes these symlinks, and "eselect net list" shows a list of them.
